body_html:
Solved by installing a fresh, updated version of Bazel. Download the right version for your/your docker's OS (To check docker OS: uname -a) from here https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases. Then:

chmod + x bazel-0.13.0-installer-linux-x86_64.sh
./bazel-0.13.0-installer-linux-x86_64.sh

Now, build should work just fine.

chmod + x bazel-0.13.0-installer-linux-x86_64.sh

Now, build should work just fine.
body:
Solved by installing a fresh, updated version of Bazel. Download the right version for your/your docker's OS (To check docker OS: `uname -a`) from here https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases. Then: 
```
chmod + x bazel-0.13.0-installer-linux-x86_64.sh
./bazel-0.13.0-installer-linux-x86_64.sh
```
Now, build should work just fine.
